just made a little piece of code that will generate a random number and handles it with if statements to get your background color

[php]

<?php function random () { return (double)rand()/(double)getrandmax(); } echo random(); if(random() < 0.33){ ?> 
<body style="background-color:green;">
<?php } if(random() < 0.66 && random() > 0.33){ ?> 
<body style="background-color:blue;">
<?php }else{ ?> 
<body style="background-color:yellow;">

<?php

} ?>

</body>

[/php]

i know it is by far NOT the best code ever
